rows.label: tlk70000039_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I thought I would never see him
again, so to meet once more like
this...it's almost like a miracle.

rows.label: tlk70000039_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Life works in strange ways
sometimes. I'm glad I lived
long enough to see the day.

rows.label: tlk70000039_05_msg0003
rows.name:
The days when I clung to the teachings
of Acedia to escape the pain of losing
Teo feel like a distant memory now

rows.label: tlk70000039_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Perhaps this is the salvation
the teachings spoke of...?
